channel.title: Setup on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Assigning Permission Sets
item.description: Setup Permission Sets You can assign 3 different types of permission sets to users. Each grants the user a different level of access to the app: C365, Setup - Enables the user to make changes to the Connector 365 Setup. C365, Edit - Enables the user to further setup the app. For example managing email attachments, email subjects and similar. C365, View - ENables the user to simply use the app.
